name: dark-background.jpg
description: Full image of a dark, subtly textured background, similar to charcoal grey or deep navy blue fabric.

name: ornate-key.png
description: A colourful, highly detailed, antique golden key with intricate filigree designs, standing upright and viewed from the front, with a white background.

name: mountain-vision.jpg
description: Full image of a majestic, snow-capped mountain peak at sunrise, with golden light hitting the summit and misty clouds in the valley below.

name: blurry-city.jpg
description: Full image of a bustling city street at night, intentionally out of focus to create vibrant bokeh light effects from traffic and building lights.

name: 90s-tech-background.jpg
description: Full image of a retro 1990s technology montage, featuring old computer parts, green and black circuit board patterns, and digital artifacts.

name: crt-monitor-overlay.png
description: A colourful, realistic frame of a 1990s-era beige CRT computer monitor, viewed from the front, with the screen area transparent on a white background.

name: stock-chart-background.jpg
description: Full image of a complex, glowing green stock market chart with multiple lines and candlestick patterns showing a steep upward trend on a dark digital screen.

name: dark-office-background.jpg
description: Full image of a dimly lit, modern corporate office at night, seen from a low angle, with large windows showing a brightly lit city skyline.

name: crowd-silhouette.png
description: A colourful silhouette of a large, dense crowd of business people standing and facing forward, with a white background.

name: graph-paper-background.jpg
description: Full image of a clean, blue-lined graph paper texture.

name: magazine-cover-template.jpg
description: Full image of a modern business magazine cover, styled like Forbes or Fortune, with a bold masthead, placeholder text, and a dynamic, abstract background.

name: old-amazon-logo.png
description: The colourful, classic Amazon.com logo from the late 1990s with the curved yellow smile line underneath, viewed straight on, with a white background.

name: vintage-browser.png
description: A colourful, complete window of a classic 1990s web browser, with the toolbar and borders, viewed from the front on a white background.

name: flying-book.png
description: A colourful, classic hardcover book with a vibrant red cover, captured mid-air as if flying, shot from a side angle with pages slightly fluttering, on a white background.

name: wall-street-buildings.jpg
description: Full image looking up at the imposing, classic architecture of skyscrapers on Wall Street, with a dramatic, slightly cloudy sky.

name: bezos-silhouette.png
description: A colourful, sharp silhouette of a man in a business suit standing confidently, viewed from the front, with a white background.

name: dark-smoky-background.jpg
description: Full image of a mysterious, dark background filled with swirling, ethereal grey and white smoke.

name: dollar-bills.png
description: A stack of colourful, crisp hundred-dollar bills, slightly fanned out and viewed from a three-quarters perspective, with a white background.

name: vortex.png
description: A colourful, hypnotizing swirling vortex of light and energy, viewed from the front as if being pulled in, on a white background.

name: quaint-bookstore.jpg
description: Full image of the warm, cozy interior of a charming, old-fashioned bookstore, with floor-to-ceiling wooden shelves packed with books and soft, ambient lighting.

name: red-x.png
description: A bold, thick, colourful red 'X' mark, painted with a textured brushstroke effect, viewed straight on, with a white background.

name: vast-warehouse.jpg
description: Full image of the interior of a massive, modern logistics warehouse with towering shelves filled with packages, seen from a wide-angle perspective.

name: letter-paper-texture.jpg
description: Full image of a clean sheet of high-quality, off-white parchment paper with a subtle, fine texture.

name: starry-sky-background.jpg
description: Full image of a breathtaking, crystal-clear night sky packed with twinkling stars and the faint glow of the Milky Way galaxy.

name: bull-market-graph.jpg
description: Full image of a vibrant, green stock market graph showing a dramatic and steep upward trend, glowing on a dark digital screen.

name: amazon-rocket.png
description: A colourful, sleek, modern rocket ship with the Amazon logo prominently displayed on its side, pointing upwards as if launching, with a white background.

name: financial-document.jpg
description: Full image of a close-up shot of a financial document, like a balance sheet, filled with columns of numbers, with some figures circled in red.

name: red-circle.png
description: A slightly imperfect, hand-drawn-style colourful red circle, as if drawn with a thick marker, with a white background.

name: future-city.jpg
description: Full image of a sprawling, gleaming futuristic city skyline at dusk, with flying vehicles and impossibly tall, sleek skyscrapers.

name: chasm.png
description: A colourful, deep and wide chasm cutting through a rocky landscape, viewed from one edge looking across, with a white background.

name: reaching-hand.png
description: A colourful, photorealistic human hand reaching out, palm up, as if trying to grasp something, shot from a side perspective, with a white background.

name: balance-scale.png
description: A colourful, classic brass balance scale, with one side tilted significantly lower than the other, viewed from the front, with a white background.

name: world-map-glow.png
description: A colourful, stylized world map with glowing blue continents and interconnected data lines, viewed from the front, with a white background.

name: data-network-overlay.png
description: A colourful, abstract overlay of glowing lines, dots, and nodes representing a complex digital data network, on a white background.

name: cosmic-nebula.jpg
description: Full image of a vibrant, colourful cosmic nebula in deep space, with swirling clouds of gas and dust in shades of pink, purple, and blue.

name: human-silhouette.png
description: A colourful, full-body silhouette of a person standing and looking up towards a vast expanse, viewed from the back, with a white background.
